org.extricate.minimud
Class mudcommand

java.lang.Object
  org.extricate.minimud.mudcommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
drop, east, emote, get, help, inventory, look, north, quit, say, shout, south, user, west, who
public class mudcommand
extends java.lang.Object

The basic class for all commands on MiniMUD. Note that such commands are loaded dynamically as required, so old commands may be altered and new commands created, while the server is still running.

Constructor Summary
mudcommand()
          The constructor does not need to do anything.
 
Method Summary
 void call(Controller con, Player p, java.util.StringTokenizer str)
          The basic call for a MUD command.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

mudcommand

public mudcommand()
The constructor does not need to do anything.

Method Detail

call

public void call(Controller con,
                 Player p,
                 java.util.StringTokenizer str)
The basic call for a MUD command. A mudcommand should always have a subclass detailing what it does. Otherwise it will simply return a message saying that it hasn't been implemented. Please note that this will always be overridden by an actual command definition!

Parameters:
con - Controller
p - Player
str - Command arguments
